description.zh-cn: 元朝政治人物、诗人，答失蛮氏。其祖先为大食（阿拉伯帝国）人。
description.en: A politician and poet of the Yuan dynasty, belonging to the Dashiman family. His ancestors were from the Arabian Empire.

description.zh-cn: 世界性宗教。
description.en: A major world religion.

description.zh-cn: 由蒙古族建立的中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by the Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 历史上由阿拉伯人建立的哈里发国家。
description.en: Caliphates established by Arabs in history.

description.zh-cn: 元朝第五位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，为礼部副长官。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official position, the deputy head of the Ministry of Rites.

description.zh-cn: 元代地方长官官职。
description.en: An official title for a local governor in the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个由汉族建立的大一统王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China established by the Han people.

description.zh-cn: 明朝学者。
description.en: Ming dynasty scholar.

description.zh-cn: 明朝人戴良为元代诗人丁鹤年的诗集所作的序言。
description.en: The preface to the poetry collection of the Yuan dynasty poet Ding Henian, written by Dai Liang of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初诗人。
description.en: Poet of the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年，由汉族人为主的全国性大规模反元起事。
description.en: A series of nationwide uprisings, primarily by Han Chinese, against the Yuan dynasty in its final years.

description.zh-cn: 伯笃鲁丁在元朝担任政治人物，官至礼部侍郎、达鲁花赤等。
description.en: Bo Dulu Ding served as a political figure in the Yuan dynasty, holding positions such as Vice Minister of Rites and Darughachi.

description.zh-cn: 其姓氏“答失蛮氏”是元代对伊斯兰教士的称呼，表明其伊斯兰教背景。
description.en: His family name 'Dashiman' was the Yuan dynasty's term for Islamic clerics, indicating his Islamic background.

description.zh-cn: 伯笃鲁丁在元英宗至治元年（1321年）考中进士，开启其仕途。
description.en: Bo Dulu Ding passed the imperial examination in the first year of the Zhizhi era of Emperor Yingzong of Yuan (1321), which started his official career.

description.zh-cn: 在元惠宗时期担任礼部侍郎、秘书太监等职务。
description.en: He served in positions such as Vice Minister of Rites and Secretary-Eunuch during the reign of Emperor Huizong of Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 元惠宗至元元年（1335年）由礼部侍郎迁秘书太监。
description.en: In the first year of the Zhiyuan era of Emperor Huizong of Yuan (1335), he was transferred from Vice Minister of Rites to Secretary-Eunuch.

position.zh-cn: 赣州路达鲁花赤、建德路达鲁花赤
position.en: Darughachi of Ganzhou Circuit, Darughachi of Jiande Circuit

description.zh-cn: 历任赣州路达鲁花赤、建德路达鲁花赤。
description.en: He successively served as Darughachi of Ganzhou Circuit and Jiande Circuit.

description.zh-cn: 在其诗作中指斥元末民变军为“妖寇猖狂”。
description.en: In his poems, he denounced the peasant rebel army of the late Yuan dynasty as 'rampant evil bandits'.

description.zh-cn: 戴良在《丁鹤年集序》中将伯笃鲁丁列为元代西域十二位著名诗人之一，肯定了其诗歌成就。
description.en: In the 'Preface to the Collection of Ding Henian', Dai Liang listed Bo Dulu Ding as one of the twelve famous poets from the Western Regions in the Yuan dynasty, affirming his poetic achievements.

description.zh-cn: 戴良为丁鹤年的诗集作序《丁鹤年集序》。
description.en: Dai Liang wrote the 'Preface to the Collection of Ding Henian' for Ding Henian's poetry collection.

description.zh-cn: 戴良是明朝人。
description.en: Dai Liang was a person from the Ming dynasty.
